title: Section
subtitle: <kui-section> provide a flexible and extensible content container with multiple variants and options

cards.title: Basic Examples
cards.subtitle: The basic usage of <kui-section> is to provide a container for your contents

cards.title: Section styles
cards.subtitle: <kui-section> include various options for customizing their backgrounds, borders, and color

cards.title: Section visibility
cards.subtitle: Control <kui-section> visibility by collapsing the contents and expanding

cards.title: Fullscreen Mode
cards.subtitle: <kui-section> can be expanded to fill the screen for maximum visibility

cards.title: Closing the section
cards.subtitle: <kui-section> can be closed and removed from the page
